use_case.title: View Help for the Current System Page
use_case.description:
This is a subfunction use case for the View Help summary use case (PSRV-00010).

The Portal Participant can open a Help page for any page in the Armenta system.

From this page, the WP has access to the complete Help system.

trigger.value: The WP wants to find information about the page currently displayed by Armenta

use_case.preconditions: The WP participant is viewing an Armenta page.
use_case.basic_path:
1. The WP selects the action to view Help for the current page.
  2. The system displays a Help page with procedures for using the current Armenta page.
use_case.success_end_conditions: The System simultaneously displays the necessary Help page and the page it documents.
